channel.title: Slower Soul Split
channel.description:
[b]Hello everyone!
I want to try to make all this stuff on a 317 PI.
I want to make this white soul split thingy slower (which goes to the enemy and back to you) and the leech as well (I've already 602 gfx's, but this thingy is too fast, I want to make it alot more slower).
Do I need to add whole new gfx graphic's (like 602+)? If so, pls give me a link, how I can do that.
Thanks everyone who can help me![/b]
PS: Sorry for my bad english, dont flame at me...

item.title: Slower Soul Split
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

The curses are made so that every time you hit something it will then play the gfx and do it in the space of time before the next hit I believe. Would not be worth your time changing this.

Read full topic

item.title: Slower Soul Split
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“I Jester I, post:3, topic:444288”][quote author=ravekitty link=topic=546980.msg4009973#msg4009973 date=1339083572]
It’s not worth the time to do it.
[/quote]

If you know how to do it pls, tell me it, it can takes hours for me, it doesn’t matter, I really want that! :([/quote]
No, I don’t, but you would have to re-create the graphics, and I don’t know how to do that either.
It would take 192383981 years to find a tutorial, and probably another 10 to figure it out

Read full topic
